name: my ninja info cards
author: fufufu420
notes:
Tfw 3SD is ded
Played ninjas all the way up, I loved this deck and had a lot of fun with the climb even though I got throughly tilted
Had such a good kog rank up match tho, we were both on the kog rank up and he played weevil burn. He lava golmed me and I top decked RDN for the win, it was so satisfying
